game_name: Angry Birds VR: Isle of Pigs
game_description: Join Red, Chuck, Bomb & the Blues to save the stolen eggs in Angry Birds VR: Isle of Pigs, the immersive VR game that puts a bird-flinging slingshot in the palm of your hand! Explore a remote island where the greedy green pigs take their vacation in 104 fun-filled stages, or build your own levels to share with your friends. The Angry Birds VR: Isle of Pigs community has made more than 17,000 user-created levels to date, so you‚Äôll always have plenty of towers to take aim at and pigs to pop! Travel to exotic beaches, steep cliffs & snowy slopes while destroying structures in the most spectacular ways,. and then slingshot your way through even more challenging ‚ÄúSpooky Levels‚Äù of Dr. Frankenswine ‚Äî where the beaches are scary, the cliffs are creepy, the slopes are slimy & the peaks are terrifying. A whole new angle on classic Angry Birds gameplay from your fine-feathered friends at Resolution Games.
Languages: English, English (Australia), English (UK), English (US), English (Canada), English (South Africa), French (France), German, Japanese, Korean, Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Venezuela)
